cards.title: Necro
powers: {Necro} deals 1 target 1 toxic damage or 1 Undead target 2 toxic damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may deal himself 2 toxic damage to draw 2 cards now.
One hero may discard up to 3 cards, then regain 2 HP for each card discarded.
Select a hero target. Increase damage dealt by that target by 3 and increase damage dealt to that target by 2 until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: Join the rest of my undead!

cards.title: Dark Pact
powers: Put an undead card from hand into play.
body: Whenever an undead target is destroyed, draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: As his minion exploded into{BR}demonic fire, Necro absorbed its{BR}tainted memories.

cards.title: Book of the Dead
body: Search your deck or trash for a ritual and put it into play or into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
You may draw a card.

cards.title: Ghoul
body: At the end of your turn, this card deals the non-undead target with the second lowest HP 2 toxic damage.
When this card enters play, # = the number of rituals in play plus 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Not something I was hoping{BR}to bump into in a dark alley.

cards.title: Chaotic Summon
body: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into play.

flavorQuotes.text: Stand back, mortals. What comes next{BR}may be unpleasant.

cards.title: Backfire Hex
body: You may destroy an ongoing card.
Put an undead card from the trash into play.

flavorQuotes.text: For every action there is a reaction.

cards.title: Blood Rite
body: When an Undead target is destroyed, all non-undead hero targets regain 2 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: May this blessing atone for my sins.

cards.title: Hellfire
body: Whenever an Undead target is destroyed, {Necro} deals 1 non-hero target 3 infernal damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Now that is black and ancient magic.{BR}Only ancient to some.

cards.title: Corpse Explosion
body: Whenever an Undead target is destroyed, {Necro} deals 2 toxic damage to all villain targets.

cards.title: Final Ritual
body: Search your trash for up to 2 Undead and put them into play. {Necro} deals each of those cards 2 toxic damage.
Then {Necro} deals himself X toxic damage, where X is 2 times the number of cards put into play this way.

flavorQuotes.text: The pain is good.{BR}...And they're here to spread it around?

cards.title: Grand Summon
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 2 Undead cards. Put 1 into play and 1 into the trash.
Shuffle the other revealed cards back into your deck.

cards.title: Possessed Corpse
body: At the end of your turn, this card deals the non-undead hero target with the lowest HP 2 infernal damage.
When this card enters play, # = the number of rituals in play plus 2.
cards.flavorReference: Detective Sedrick, Book of the Dead #310

cards.title: Demonic Imp
body: At the end of your turn, destroy 1 hero equipment or ongoing card.
When this card is destroyed, one player may play a card.
When this card enters play, # = the number of rituals in play plus 2.

flavorQuotes.text: They are troublesome fuel for his{BR}necromantic fire.

cards.flavorReference: The Stranger, Book of the Dead #576

cards.title: Tainted Blood
body: At the end of your draw phase, {Necro} deals the undead target with the lowest HP 2 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Tis not a sickness, but a curse.

cards.title: Talisman
body: Place this card next to a target. That target is immune to damage from undead targets.

flavorQuotes.text: This will protect you from my {BR}horrors.

cards.title: Abomination
body: At the end of your turn, this card deals all non-Undead hero targets 2 toxic damage.
When this card is destroyed, all players draw a card.
When this card enters play, # = the number of rituals in play plus 6.

cards.title: Zombie
body: At the end of your turn, this card deals the non-Undead hero target with the highest HP 2 toxic damage.
When this card enters play, # = the number of rituals in play plus 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Of course it doesn't speak.{BR}It doesn't have the brains.
